name: Nightmare of the Undead
description:
Overview

Nightmare of the Undead is a simplistic top down shooter survival game in which the player must survive against numerous waves of the undead.

Earn experience by killing and unlock perks to enhance your character and weapons.The game is currently in Beta so may contain bugs. Please report any bugs!

Features

  • Top Down Shooter
  • Survival
  • Zombie killing
  • Earn Experience
  • Unlock perks

Controls

  • WASD/Directional - Movement
  • R - Reload
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot Weapon
  • Right Mouse Button - Pickup ammo/weapon
  • (Hold) Left Shift - Sprint
  • Esc - Pause

System Requirements

Operating System: Windows 7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8 Ghz
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Graphics: Direct X 8 compatible Graphics Card
Hard Drive: 200 MB Hard Drive space
